metadata.title: CVE-2016-3845 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The video driver in the kernel in Android before 2016-08-05 on Nexus 5devices allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, akainternal bug 28399876.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
